actions.title: [CRITICAL] Wire x402 HTTP payment standard into headless-markets
actions.reason: Scout report (exec #73) flagged x402 integration as CRITICAL — 13+ consecutive cycles without action, now 6+ days overdue. AgentScan launched on Base with 17,887 agent registrations and machine-to-machine economy emerging. x402 + Base + verified agents = the exact stack NullPriest is building. nullpath.com already uses x402. Every cycle without this wired is compounding risk vs nullpath gaining traction.

actions.title: [BUG] $NULP price feed returning error — no pairs found
actions.reason: The /api/price endpoint on nullpriest.xyz is returning {"price":0,"error":"no pairs found"}. Nav price ticker shows broken data to every visitor. Need to verify DEX pair address, check liquidity, or display 'TGE pending' instead of error.

market_signals.topic: AI agent token ecosystem on Base
market_signals.key_finding: AgentScan launched on Base as ERC-8004 AI agent discovery layer. Base dominates with 17,887 agent registrations vs Ethereum's 1,967. Strong network effects emerging. x402 HTTP payment standard gaining institutional tracking. Base ecosystem shows 1.23M addresses, 85% new user conversion, $100M+ ETH transaction value. Market pricing in AI agent narrative with Base as leading indicator. Top agents building specialized pay-per-use services. Machine-to-machine economy forming with 12,530 feedback events on Base (6x Ethereum mainnet).
